name: Monet Heist (SpaceQuackers)
description:
This year's theme for GMTK Game Jam 2020 is ‘Out of Control’, and our team has worked together ceaselessly over the past 48 hours to create an iteration that we find most befitting of the topic, as manifested in a stealth-puzzle, 2nd person perspective game balancing both 2D and 3D elements to create a unique experience for all players, known as ‘Monet Heist’ (all puns intended and appreciated)

This game jam was a perfect opportunity for us to exhibit and practice our game development skills, as all assets in the game right down to the music composition has been painstakingly designed and created by our team, Space Quackers, to provide the retro user experience and narrative we can offer despite the limited production timeline/restrictions.

In the game, you play as Salvador Daring, a wanted criminal who is on his way to the national museum for a heist! Your role as the player is to sneak through a complex museum to steal the Golden Duck, a masterpiece by renowned artist Clauda Monet. But beware, you are constantly being monitored by outdated, busted-up surveillance cameras operating around the compound and it's your job to control the player OUT OF CONTROL room without being seen!

Sadly we did not have the official GMTK badge on our entry despite submitting on time, and we only noticed the error after the grace period ended. However we qualified for a second chance on the GMTK Deadline Missers jam!!

The core of our game was developed during the game jam timeframe, but we have since optimised and polished the game in the 3 days that followed, and are planning to update more!

https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-deadline-missers-jam/rate/701934

We hope you enjoy the game!
